data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Free kick for Huesca in the half of Villarreal.
In the minute 4, Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Huesca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Villarreal's half?
Corner awarded to Huesca.
In the minute 5, Goal kick for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Villarreal pushes forward through Gerard Moreno, whose finish on goal is saved.
Villarreal have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
In the minute 9, Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Huesca a goal kick.
Free kick Villarreal.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Villarreal.
In the minute 11, Throw-in Villarreal.
Throw-in for Villarreal in the half of Huesca.
In Villarreal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 13, At Estadio de la Ceramica, Villarreal are penalized for being offside.
Huesca push upfield but Xavier Estrada Fernandez quickly pulls them for offside.
In Villarreal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 17, Villarreal's Paco Alcacer is whistled for offside at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Free kick Huesca.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Villarreal in the half of Huesca.
Villarreal's Samuel Chukwueze gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Huesca defender.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez blows against Villarreal's Raul Albiol for offside.
In the minute 22, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Villarreal.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a Villarreal throw-in in Huesca's half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Villarreal.
Villarreal have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
Ball goes out of play for a Huesca goal kick.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Huesca at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Can Huesca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Villarreal's half?
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
Huesca to take a throw-in in Villarreal territory.
Villarreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Huesca in the half of Villarreal.
Shinji Okazaki (Huesca) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Villarreal have a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Villarreal's Alfonso Pedraza has been booked in Villarreal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Villarreal.
In the minute 38, Huesca have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
Ball safe as Villarreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Villarreal in their own half.
In the minute 39, Corner awarded to Huesca.
Villarreal have a goal kick.
Huesca needs to be cautious. Villarreal have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 42, Goal! Pablo Maffeo gives Huesca a 0-1 lead in Villarreal.
Juan Carlos instrumental with a fine assist.
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
In the minute 45, Can Villarreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Huesca's half?
Xavier Estrada Fernandez will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
David Ferreiro of Huesca smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Huesca are caught offside.
Free kick Villarreal.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Villarreal in the half of Huesca.
Corner awarded to Villarreal.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a throw-in for Villarreal, close to Huesca's area.
In the minute 49, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a Villarreal throw-in in Huesca's half.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Huesca's Rafa Mir breaks free at Estadio de la Ceramica. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 51, It's a goal kick for the home team in Villarreal.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Huesca a goal kick.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 53, Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Villarreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Villarreal goal kick.
In the minute 56, In Villarreal Huesca attack through Shinji Okazaki. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Paco Alcacer for Villarreal gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 57, Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Huesca a goal kick.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Villarreal.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 62, Huesca are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Kelechi Nwakali is replacing Juan Carlos for the away team.
Michel is making the team's second substitution at Estadio de la Ceramica with Eugeni Valderrama replacing David Ferreiro.
Villarreal's Dani Parejo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Huesca goal kick.
In the minute 66, In Villarreal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Villarreal have been awarded a penalty in Villarreal...
Gerard Moreno equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
In the minute 70, Villarreal are whistled for offside.
In Villarreal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 72, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Villarreal.
The home team replace Ruben Pena with Mario Gaspar.
In the minute 77, Villarreal make their second substitution with Takefusa Kubo replacing Paco Alcacer.
The home team have replaced Francis Coquelin with Vicente Iborra. This is the third substitution made today by Unai Emery.
Villarreal have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
In the minute 78, Villarreal's Moi Gomez misses with an attempt on goal.
Huesca have a goal kick.
Jaime Seoane is on a sub for Mikel Rico for Huesca.
In the minute 80, Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Villarreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Villarreal to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Huesca at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Villarreal have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Villarreal.
In the minute 86, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a Villarreal throw-in in Huesca's half.
Corner awarded to Villarreal.
Free kick Villarreal.
Villarreal are coming forward and Samuel Chukwueze gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Huesca at Estadio de la Ceramica.
In the minute 88, Pedro Mosquera for Huesca has been booked by Xavier Estrada Fernandez and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 89, Michel (Huesca) is making a fourth substitution, with Joaquin Munoz replacing Rafa Mir.
Luisinho is replacing Pablo Maffeo for Huesca at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Can Huesca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Villarreal's half?
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Villarreal in the half of Huesca.
Can Villarreal capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Free kick for Villarreal in the half of Huesca.
Huesca's Pablo Insua gets in a shot on goal at Estadio de la Ceramica. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
In Villarreal Huesca's Jorge Pulido is caught offside.
Villarreal drives forward and Takefusa Kubo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in high up the field for Villarreal in Villarreal.
Joaquin Munoz (Huesca) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Villarreal a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Huesca.
Jaime Seoane (Huesca) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Villarreal goal kick.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Villarreal make their fourth substitution with Fer Nino replacing Moi Gomez.
